message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but I can only go up to $100.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do a bit better than that. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility.  I'm still hoping to get it for $105.  Let's see if we can bridge the gap.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than that. I'm willing to sell it to you for $115.
